overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Use the ReeeeecallStudy API to manage study data from external tools, scripts, and apps.

what.title: What is the API?
what.body: The ReeeeecallStudy API is a RESTful API that lets you view and manage decks, cards, study history, and more via HTTP requests. Use it for automation scripts, third-party app integration, and data analysis.

baseUrl.title: Base URL
baseUrl.body:
All API requests are based on the Supabase project URL.

Base URL: https://your-project.supabase.co/rest/v1

responseFormat.title: Response Format
responseFormat.body:
All responses are in JSON format with Content-Type: application/json.

On success, resource data is returned. On error, responses follow { "error": "message" } format.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: All requests are authenticated using an API key.

getKey.title: Getting an API Key
getKey.body:
Settings → API Key section → Click 'Generate New API Key'.
Enter a name (max 64 chars) to receive a 35-character key starting with rc_.

⚠️ The key is only shown once. Copy it to a safe place!

method.title: Authentication Method
method.body:
Pass your API key as a Bearer token in the Authorization header.

Authorization: Bearer rc_your_api_key_here

Missing or invalid keys return 401 Unauthorized.

management.title: Key Management
management.body:
• You can have up to 1 API key
• If lost, delete the existing key and create a new one
• Delete unused keys immediately
• Use environment variables instead of hardcoding keys

rateLimits.title: Rate Limits
rateLimits.description: Request counts are limited for API stability.

free.title: Free Tier
free.body:
• Daily API requests: 1,000
• API calls per minute: 60
• Card creates per minute: 30
• Bulk card creates per minute: 5 (max 100 per request)
• Total cards: 5,000
• Total decks: 50

pro.title: Pro Tier
pro.body:
• Daily API requests: 10,000
• API calls per minute: 300
• Card creates per minute: 120
• Bulk card creates per minute: 20
• Total cards: 50,000
• Total decks: 500

exceeded.title: When Limits Are Exceeded
exceeded.body:
Returns 429 Too Many Requests.

Response headers include:
• X-RateLimit-Limit: Max requests
• X-RateLimit-Remaining: Remaining requests
• Retry-After: Wait time in seconds

statusCodes.title: HTTP Status Codes
statusCodes.body:
• 200 OK — Success
• 201 Created — Resource created
• 204 No Content — Deleted (no response body)
• 400 Bad Request — Invalid request (missing fields, validation failure)
• 401 Unauthorized — Auth failure (missing or invalid API key)
• 404 Not Found — Resource not found
• 429 Too Many Requests — Rate limit exceeded
• 500 Internal Server Error — Server error
